title: Ray of Frost
tags: how to acquire ray of frost
content:
10th level (3d8). A target with the Wet status is vulnerable to cold/lightning damage and will sustain double damage from this spell. If cast at a target standing in a Water/Blood Surface, the surface will become an Ice Surface (half move, save or Prone). The verbal component has the caster saying "Glacius", Latin for "ice".

Cantrips Acid Splash ♦ Blade Ward ♦ Bone Chill ♦ Dancing Lights ♦ Eldritch Blast ♦ Fire Bolt ♦ Friends ♦ Githyanki Psionics: Mage Hand ♦ Guidance ♦ Improved Minor Illusion
